name: DARK FALL
description:
You play as Gredhrer, a girl who was tricked into being offered up as a human sacrifice in the cult she belonged to. She doesn't die, instead she gets trapped in a dimension inhabited by Ancient Gods.

Meet Dr. Faust, a fanatical historian of the occult who somehow obtained a fragment of the Necronomicon.

A small project done under three weeks for class made by me and my partner. Art style based on Mike Mignola's art and Hollow Knight, with some Hades influences.

** The game has some bugs that weren't patched (grounding check when falling off platforms) and the jump animation is a little wacky, but this was our first "big" project and we're really happy about it, knowing our limitations**

Any feedback is welcome! :)
